name: Melancholy Blue
description:
Welcome to Melancholy Blue; A Biopunk Visual Novel

40,000 years in the future, the Earth was struck by a massive asteroid, leading to the near destruction of humanity. Now with people rebuilding, they find themselves with limited resources, and have went down a different technological route; Bio-Tech. Everything these days is powered through Bio-Tech, including vehicles, industry etc.

Throughout this game, you will play as a bartender of a new bar - set in the capital city, Lunn. After your previous bar was destroyed, you moved to the capital to start anew.  You will meet new people, and learn about them as their stories intertwine, all the while making a variety of drinks for your customers.
